name: Abrade
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

name: Accomplished Automaton
oracle_text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: Was it just lonely, or was some form of evolution inevitable?

name: Alabaster Mage
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text:
"We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons."
—Alabaster creed

name: Ancestral Blade
oracle_text:
When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Ancient Stirrings
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Angel of the Dawn
oracle_text:
Flying
When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

name: Apprentice Wizard
flavor_text: Aspiring wizards must demonstrate basic levels of willpower and mental discipline to even be considered for an apprenticeship.

name: Argivian Restoration
oracle_text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Balduvian Rage
oracle_text:
Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks."
—Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Bloodbriar
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.
flavor_text:
"There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back."
—Nissa Revane

name: Bone Picker
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.
Flying, deathtouch
flavor_text: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Cast Down
oracle_text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
flavor_text:
"Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."
—*Chainer's Torment*

name: Cathartic Reunion
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

name: Cathodion
oracle_text: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C}.
flavor_text: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

name: Chatter of the Squirrel
oracle_text:
Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Chromatic Star
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Clear Shot
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"What worked to bring down angels will do the same for these horrors."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

name: Cloudreader Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Conclave Naturalists
oracle_text: When Conclave Naturalists enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Your swords and wards have no power here."

name: Corridor Monitor
oracle_text: When Corridor Monitor enters the battlefield, untap target artifact or creature you control.
flavor_text: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.

name: Costly Plunder
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

name: Crib Swap
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

name: Crusader of Odric
oracle_text: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

name: Crushing Vines
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Your veil's curse won't stop me, deathmage. I have taken down countless night hunters. This dark plane is not big enough for you to hide."
—Garruk Wildspeaker, to Liliana Vess

name: Darksteel Axe
flavor_text: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

name: Death-Hood Cobra
oracle_text:
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains reach until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Size alone does not guarantee survival."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Defiant Salvager
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
oracle_text: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

name: Divest
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

name: Driver of the Dead
oracle_text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

name: Eager Construct
oracle_text: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.

name: Elvish Aberration
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Everflowing Chalice
oracle_text:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.
{T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

name: Executioner's Capsule
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

name: Expedition Map
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Faerie Mechanist
oracle_text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Fierce Empath
oracle_text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Flayer Husk
Fortify
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Frogify
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)
flavor_text: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

name: Glaze Fiend
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

name: Gleaming Barrier
oracle_text:
Defender
When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"Gold without freedom might as well be lead."
—Angrath

name: Glint-Sleeve Artisan
oracle_text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: "Shine bright, bolts tight."

name: Goblin Gaveleer
oracle_text:
Trample
Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.
flavor_text:
"When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."

name: Golem-Skin Gauntlets
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

name: Heartless Pillage
oracle_text:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid — If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Ichor Wellspring
oracle_text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Our glorious infection has taken hold."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Iron Bully
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Why would someone have built ... wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
—Commander Grozdan

name: Iron League Steed
oracle_text:
Haste
Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: The Iron League prides itself on its metal-shaping techniques.

name: Kazuul's Toll Collector
oracle_text: {0}: Attach target Equipment you control to Kazuul's Toll Collector. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: Travelers are advised to bring extra swords, preferably shiny ones.

name: Kozilek's Predator
oracle_text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

name: Lightning Axe
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay {5}.
Lightning Axe deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"A gargoyle's meat can be carved with an ordinary cleaver, but for its petrous hide . . ."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, *The Underworld Cookbook*

name: Magnifying Glass
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: Knight-Inquisitors of Saint Raban delve deep into mysteries best left unexplored.

name: Metallic Rebuke
oracle_text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text:
"Too little, too late. The machine is in motion."
—Tezzeret

name: Metalspinner's Puzzleknot
oracle_text:
When Metalspinner's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Metalspinner's Puzzleknot: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Might of the Masses
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
flavor_text: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

name: Myr Retriever
oracle_text: When Myr Retriever dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Mephidross gives up treasure easily . . . as long as you take its place.

name: Orcish Vandal
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Vandal deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Every ancient relic is a weapon if you throw it hard enough.

name: Parasitic Strix
oracle_text:
Flying
When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

name: Peace Strider
oracle_text: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."
—Kessla, Sylvok shaman

name: Pyrite Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: It deals 2 damage to any target.
{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Melt that which was never frozen."
—Spellbomb inscription

name: Rapacious Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"Surely it won't notice if I take—"
—Theria the Sly, last words

name: Relic Runner
oracle_text: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

name: Remember the Fallen
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

name: Revoke Existence
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The time has come for us to throw off the chains of tyrannical gods and antiquated superstitions."
—Tikaia, disciple of Uremides

name: Salivating Gremlins
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Salivating Gremlins gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: If an elf can dream it, a dwarf can build it, and a gremlin can eat it.

name: Sanctum Gargoyle
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

name: Sanctum Spirit
oracle_text:
Lifelink
Discard a historic card: Sanctum Spirit gains indestructible until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
flavor_text:
"When history becomes too mournful, even good souls may choose to forget."
—Shalai, voice of Plenty

name: Sickleslicer
Sift
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

oracle_text:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Silumgar Scavenger. It gains haste until end of turn if it exploited that creature.

name: Skinbrand Goblin
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"These Gruul skin-runes—discern whether their patterns evoke streets, leylines, or both. You have four days."
—Niv-Mizzet, to his assistant

name: Skinwing
Steel Sabotage

flavor_text:

flavor_text:
"We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Supernatural Stamina

flavor_text:
"All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

name: Surge Node
oracle_text:

{1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Surge Node: Put a charge counter on target artifact.

oracle_text:

{T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
flavor_text: Urza threw himself into his research, pushing the boundaries of both possibility and morality.

flavor_text: Urza studied the creations of the Thran not simply to learn from them, but to surpass them.
